title: Can i create this summoner name without a box appearing in it?
body: Im going to change my summoner name to RÄ™wind and i was wondering if there will be any issues with the E from another language because i sometimes see people's summoner names like this but it has a box instead of the letter. I do not want that. Please help and ty !

replies.body: NA doesn't currently support special characters in summoner names.  Those who do have it were able to a very long time when it was still possible.  Check our [Name FAQ ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ)for more info!  Hope that helps clear things up!
